summary: Build a modern, recruiter-friendly personal portfolio website for Anuj Chaudhary (Business Analytics/MBA) with clean minimal design, ordered sections (Home→About→Projects→Experience→Skills→Achievements→Education→Contact), responsive layout, subtle animations, smooth scrolling, and SEO/ATS optimization.
architectural_notes: Single-page portfolio with ordered sections: Home → About → Projects → Experience → Skills → Achievements → Education → Contact
Design system: light background, dark text, navy/dark teal accent; modern sans-serif typography; subtle animations + smooth scrolling
Non-functional requirements: responsive (mobile-first), SEO optimized, fast loading, ATS keyword-friendly content
known_issues: Resume download CTA currently does not open the intended resume file; needs correct file/link behavior.

Implement the requested visual design system: clean/minimal/professional layout, light background with dark text, accent color navy blue or dark teal, modern sans-serif typography, subtle animations, and a recruiter-friendly presentation.

Build the Home section with: full name (Anuj Chaudhary), title (“Business Analytics Professional | Aspiring Business Analyst”), the provided intro paragraph verbatim, and 3 CTA buttons: View Projects (scrolls to Projects), Download Resume (downloads a local PDF asset), Contact Me (scrolls to Contact).

Build the About Me section including: a short professional bio (professional tone), the stated career goal, strengths list, and tools list exactly covering: SQL, Power BI, Excel, Python, Prompt Engineering, AI tools.
Build the Projects section with three project cards. Each card must show: project name, description, tools used, and outcome, using the user-provided content.
Build the Experience section with the role: “Management Trainee Intern — Sai Enterprises (Feb 2024 – May 2024)” and include all provided bullet points/metrics.
Build the Skills section and display the provided skills as skill bars or icons: SQL, Power BI, Excel, Python, Prompt Engineering, Data Analysis, Visualization, Critical Thinking, Problem Solving.
Build the Achievements section and include all provided achievements as bullet points with a professional, recruiter-friendly presentation.
Build the Education section containing: “MBA – Business Analytics | Sharda University | 2024–2026” and “BBA – Human Resources | Sharda University | 2021–2024”.
Build the Contact section with visible email and phone fields, a LinkedIn button, and a contact form that collects at least: name, email, message. The form must show success and error states.
Add a simple, professional footer displaying exactly: “© 2026 Anuj Chaudhary | Business Analytics Portfolio”.

SEO + performance: set appropriate page title and meta description for Anuj Chaudhary’s Business Analytics portfolio; ensure semantic headings per section; ensure fast loading by keeping assets local and lightweight.

Ensure all on-page text maintains a professional tone and is ATS keyword optimized around Business Analyst/Business Analytics keywords, while preserving the user-provided statements verbatim where provided.

Update the Contact section contact information to use the user-provided email, phone number, and LinkedIn profile URL. Specifically, in the Contact Information cards, update both the link targets and the visible text to match: email = ac8739667@gmail.com, phone = 9560477600 (use tel:+919560477600), LinkedIn = https://www.linkedin.com/in/anuj-chaudhary-23786024b.

Ensure the Home section “Download Resume” CTA opens the intended resume PDF reliably in the browser. The resume file must be served as a static asset and the click behavior must open the PDF (e.g., in a new tab/window) rather than failing silently.
